data.sentence: The word كَرِيمٍ comes from the root ك ر م and is associated with the meanings: To be productive, generous, precious, valuable, honourable, noble, All-Generous, Most Generous

data.meanings: make cold/chilly/cool, died, cessation of motion, become still/quiet/motionless, amazed/stupefied, became permanent/fixed/settled, became lean/emaciated/weak, slept, hail/snow, beverage that cools the heat of thirst.
data.sentence: The word بَارِدٍ comes from the root ب ر د and is associated with the meanings: make cold/chilly/cool, died, cessation of motion, become still/quiet/motionless, amazed/stupefied, became permanent/fixed/settled, became lean/emaciated/weak, slept, hail/snow, beverage that cools the heat of thirst.
